Mt. Tamalpais.notes: Trails are in good condition with no reported hazards.

Ford Ord.weatherConditions: Breezy with clouds and breaks of sun; a couple of showers this afternoon
Ford Ord.notes: Heavy rain overnight; trails are muddy and unsafe for riding.

Rockville Hills Regional Park.weatherConditions: Mainly cloudy and chilly; breezy this morning, then a couple of showers this afternoon
Rockville Hills Regional Park.notes: Trails are clear with no significant hazards reported.

China Camp State Park.weatherConditions: Cool with intervals of clouds and sunshine; breezy this afternoon
China Camp State Park.notes: Mud after recent rainfall; trails are slippery and unsafe.

Joaquin Miller Park.weatherConditions: Intervals of clouds and sunshine with a brief shower or two
Joaquin Miller Park.notes: Trails are in good condition; minor wet spots in shaded areas.

Pacifica.weatherConditions: Intervals of clouds and sunshine with a brief shower or two
Pacifica.notes: Recent rain has made trails muddy and unsafe for riding.
